question_list.question: How critical are the enhancements?
question_list.description: With limited time and resources, Speedy Stream wants to improve part of the prototype first. To decide where to invest, we want to gather your feedback on the video elements that you think need the most enhancement for the current prototype you just experienced (with five elements without any enhancements). How critical are the enhancements on each video element in the current prototype for you to understand the content in a weather forecast video?

options.description: The sound of the audio is clear and not muffled
The image of the video is clear and not pixelated
The audio is smooth and and does not stutter
The video visuals plays smoothly and does not jitter
Audio and Video are in sync
